nodes.text: Tann Atar was a leader in the Strus clan on Jakku during the Cold War.

Atar favored the use of a vibro-ax at the time when the Strus clan came into contact with a group of nomads over the Starlight Wanderer. The clan was defeated in the encounter by a group of spacers assisting the nomads.
Tann Atar appears in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game adventure A Call for Heroes.
